import { Card } from '@site/src/components/shared/Card'
import { CardContainer } from '@site/src/components/shared/CardContainer'

# ✨ Robo Templates

We have a collection of templates that you can use to kickstart your project or just use as a reference. Each one is designed to help you get started with **Robo.js** quickly and show what's possible.

Want to contribute your own? Submit a pull request!

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="https://github.com/Wave-Play/robo.js/blob/main/CONTRIBUTING.md"
		title="📝 Contributing"
		description="How to contribute to Robo.js"
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Discord Activities

**[Discord Activities](../discord-activities/getting-started)** are web apps that run inside Discord and can be built using **[HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP)**, **[CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS)**, and **[JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)**. They use Discord's **[Embedded App SDK](https://github.com/discord/embedded-app-sdk/)** to interact with Discord APIs.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="./discord-activities/vanilla-js"
		title="📦 Vanilla (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript template without any UI libraries."
	/>
	<Card
		href="./discord-activities/vanilla-ts"
		title="📦 Vanilla (TS)"
		description="A basic TypeScript template without any UI libraries."
	/>
	<Card
		href="./discord-activities/react-js"
		title="📦 React (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript template using React."
	/>
	<Card
		href="./discord-activities/react-ts"
		title="📦 React (TS)"
		description="A basic TypeScript template using React."
	/>
</CardContainer>

		description="A basic TypeScript template using tRPC and React."
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Discord Bots

**[Discord Bots](../discord-bots/getting-started)** are bots that run inside Discord and can be built using **[JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)** or **[TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)**. They use **[Discord.js](https://discord.js.org/)** to interact with Discord APIs.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card href="./discord-bots/starter-js" title="📦 Starter (JS)" description="A basic JavaScript bot using Robo.js." />
	<Card href="./discord-bots/starter-ts" title="📦 Starter (TS)" description="A basic TypeScript bot using Robo.js." />
</CardContainer>

### MrJAwesome

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="./discord-bots/mrjawesome-dev-toolkit-js"
		title="📦 Dev Toolkit (JS)"
		description="An all-in-one toolkit for developers by MrJAwesome."
	/>
	<Card
		href="./discord-bots/mrjawesome-dev-toolkit-ts"
		title="📦 Dev Toolkit (TS)"
		description="An all-in-one toolkit for developers by MrJAwesome."
	/>
	<Card
		href="./discord-bots/mrjawesome-slash-commands-js"
		title="📦 Slash Command Package (JS)"
		description="Quickstart for creating slash commands by MrJAwesome."
	/>
	<Card
		href="./discord-bots/mrjawesome-slash-commands-ts"
		title="📦 Slash Command Package (TS)"
		description="Quickstart for creating slash commands by MrJAwesome."
	/>
</CardContainer>

		title="📦 TagBot (TS)"
		description="A tag bot using TagScript and TypeScript."
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Plugins

**[Robo Plugins](../plugins/overview)** are special. They let you add features to your **Robo** with one command and integrate seamlessly thanks to the **[Robo File Structure](./robojs/files)**. What's more, anyone can **[create a plugin](./create-robo/plugins)**.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card
		href="./templates/plugins/starter-plugin-js"
		title="📦 Starter (JS)"
		description="A basic JavaScript plugin for Robo.js."
	/>
</CardContainer>

## Web Apps

Standalone web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, running in the browser and on the server. They can be built using **[HTML](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP)**, **[CSS](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS)**, and **[JavaScript](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript)**.

### Starters

<CardContainer>
	<Card href="./web-apps/react-js" title="📦 React (JS)" description="A basic JavaScript web app using Robo.js." />
	<Card href="./web-apps/react-ts" title="📦 React (TS)" description="A basic TypeScript web app using Robo.js." />
	<Card href="./web-apps/svelte-js" title="📦 Svelte (JS)" description="Svelte web app using JavaScript." />
	<Card href="./web-apps/svelte-ts" title="📦 Svelte (TS)" description="Svelte web app using TypeScript." />
</CardContainer>

<br />

:::tip

**Made something awesome?** Don't forget to host it so others can use it too!

Check out our **[Hosting Overview](../hosting/overview)** to learn how.

:::
